content:
From the category theory mailing list:

The 2024 Category Theory Octoberfest will be held on the weekend of October 26th through October 27th. The meeting will be virtual. (Links will be provided soon.) Following the tradition of past Octoberfests, this is intended to be an informal meeting, covering all areas of category theory and its applications.Â  Talks by PhD students and young researchers are particularly encouraged!

If interested in speaking, please send title and abstract to Rick Blute at rblute@uottawa.ca by October 7th.

hi, i was wondering if i could access the recordings for this https://richardblute.ca/octoberfest-2024/
are they uploaded anywhere?

Rick said the videos would be made public somewhere sometime. It's typical for this sort of thing to take weeks or even months. You might keep looking on the conference website - they're not up yet - or you might wait until I mention that my talk is available, which I'll probably do on my thread here.
@David Sprayberry :wave: The videos are now on the website
